contexts.context: In Hungary live - beside <mark>Magyars</mark> - several other tribes, like Germans, Romanians...
...be the majority in the whole populace and the <mark>Magyars</mark> do know that if all those tribes get together...
...gain advantages for themselves by being devoted to the <mark>Magyars</mark> and therefore make enemies with the other peoples....
...Slovaks, 32,892 Croatians and Slavic people, 27,113 <mark>Magyars</mark>, 23,597 Germans, 18,759 Jewish people, 9,819...
